en.title: Bachelor in {{Software Engineering}}
en.institution: City University of Science and Information Technology.
en.text:
Currently pursuing a Bachelor's degree in Software Engineering with a focus on core computer science and software development concepts. Key areas of study include:

  • C++: Object-oriented programming and problem-solving
  • Python: Scripting, automation, and backend development
  • Networking: Fundamentals of computer networks and communication
  • Databases: Design and management using MySQL and SQLite
  • Security: Basics of cybersecurity and ethical practices
  • Backend: Web application development with Flask, Django, and REST APIs
  • Frontend: User interface development with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React

Through academic projects and practical assignments, I am strengthening my skills as a full-stack developer and preparing for a career in the software industry.

en.title: {{FSC}} in Pre-Engineering
en.text:
Completed FSc in Pre-Engineering with a strong emphasis on analytical and scientific studies. Key learnings include:

  • Mathematics: Advanced concepts in algebra, calculus, and trigonometry
  • Inorganic Chemistry: Study of periodic table elements, chemical bonding, and reactions
  • Advanced Physics: Understanding mechanics, electricity, magnetism, and modern physics fundamentals

This program strengthened my problem-solving abilities and built a solid foundation for engineering and computer science.

en.title: {{Matriculation}} in Science
en.text:
Completed Matriculation in Science with a strong foundation in core subjects. Key learnings include:

  • Mathematics: Logical reasoning and problem-solving
  • Physics: Basics of motion, energy, and mechanics
  • Chemistry: Fundamental concepts of elements and reactions
  • Biology: Understanding of living organisms and life processes

This laid the groundwork for my interest in technology and advanced studies.
